Exaggerate: The claim that wearing a face mask compromises the immune system is an exaggeration as there is no scientific evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient support as there is no scientific evidence to back it up.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that wearing a face mask compromises the immune system without any basis.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation by stating that wearing a face mask actually protects the immune system by preventing the spread of COVID-19.
